email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

We are inquiring about a shipment of 15,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms. Could you provide your best freight rate and vessel availability for this cargo?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel SEA MASTER, DWT 75,000, LOA 225m, for your shipment. The rate is USD 45 per MT. Laycan is 10-15 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lisa Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 45 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer USD 42 per MT. Demurrage is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if you need any more details.

Best regards,
Lisa Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

USD 42 sounds better. Can we lock in the SEA MASTER with a laycan of 10-15 October? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Lisa Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
John Doe
